Class CCar

java.lang.Object
VehicleRental.CVehicle
VehicleRental.CCar
public class CCar extends CVehicle
Represents a car available for rental. Inherits from the CVehicle base class and adds car-specific attributes such as engine type, number of seats, miles per gallon, and model. This class is used to calculate rental costs and display car specifications.
Since:
04-25-2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Julia McAllister

    • CCar

      public CCar(int rentalDays, String engineType, int numSeats, double milesPerGallon, String model)
      Constructs a CCar object with specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      rentalDays - Number of days the car is rented
      engineType - The engine type of the car (e.g., V6, V8)
      numSeats - Number of seats in the car
      milesPerGallon - Fuel efficiency in miles per gallon
      model - The car model (e.g., Honda Civic)
